title: "Lessons Learned From 1600+ ICO Funding Rounds"
excerpt: "While reviewing more than 1600 English speaking Whitepapers on Initial Coin Offering (ICO) campaigns, that took place between January 2017 and December 2018 researchers from two US-based universities investigated various signals that might have impacted the outcome of the fundraising process."
